entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is a person who is angry and upset. He has just hit his head on the wall and is still shaking with anger.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is a person who is trying to calm Harry down. She is concerned about him and does not want them to fight.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is a person who is defending Hermione from Harry's anger. He tells Harry that he should not have said something to Lupin.

entities.name: lupin
entities.description: Lupin is a person who has been mentioned by Harry and Ron in their conversation. Harry had spoken to him out of the fireplace.

entities.name: sirius
entities.description: Sirius is a person who has fallen through the veil, as seen in Harry's broken images.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is a person who was suspended and broken in midair, as seen in Harry's broken images.

relationships.description: Harry had said something to Lupin that upset Ron and Hermione.
Ron defended Hermione from Harry's anger.
Hermione tried to calm down Harry, who was angry and upset.
